alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 3:59PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Hamilton, eastern Echols and central Clinch Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 359 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of Belmont, or 10 miles northeast of Jasper, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Needmore. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for northern Florida...and southeastern Georgia.
